com.oracle.bmc.core

Class BlockstorageWaiters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oracle.bmc.core.BlockstorageWaiters

  • @Generated(value="OracleSDKGenerator",
           comments="API Version: 20160918")
public class BlockstorageWaiters
extends Object

    Collection of helper methods to produce Waiters for different resources of Blockstorage.

    The default configuration used is defined by Waiters#DEFAULT_POLLING_WAITER.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BlockstorageWaiters(ExecutorService executorService, Blockstorage client)
